Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Mom of 3
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera! It is light weight and durable. I have owned this camera for about 3-4 years now. I go through a 2G sd card about every 2 months.  I just throw it in my purse and it goes everywhere with me, its ready when I need it. It takes great quality photos and video. Perfect for a mom with three little ones.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: David L. Nixon
Reviews.Content: Used product quality exactly as described. Having had this camera before, I knew what to expect and wasn't disappointed with purchase.

ProductInfo.Features:
3.6x Optical Zoom
2.5-inch large LCD for Easy Shooting
MEGA Optical Image Stabilizer
Wide-Aspect VGA Movies (848 x 480) at 30 fps
Take up to 320 pictures on a single charge
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic LUMIX DMC-FX07 3.6 Optical Zoom Digital Camera-Chocolate Brown
